reviewText: A welcome addition to my Godzilla VHS collection. This set comes with two Godzilla movies, Godzilla King of the Monsters and Godzilla vs. Megalon. Both tapes come in this cool box with some artwork from Godzilla vs. Megalon. Haven't watched the tapes themselves yet though since I mainly ordered this set for the boxart.
The tapes play just fine and are great to add to a movie collection this is a must have collection

i got thes babies for a 2-pack at a garage sale years ago for probadly 2 or 3 dollars and that was good for me because i couldn't find the meglon editon they were both  good espeiclly king of the monsters i reecomend you to buy this at a low price but remember 2 is better than one!
